title: NY TEXTile lecture update
content:
Hi All,

A good description of the talk I am giving at the Type Directors Club later this month, together with some examples is here...  
 [http://casacara.wordpress.com/2010/01/16/something-graphic-this-way-comes/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014134350/http:/casacara.wordpress.com/2010/01/16/something-graphic-this-way-comes/ "http://casacara.wordpress.com/2010/01/16/something-graphic-this-way-comes/")

Please forward the link to anyone you think may be interested.

Thanks

Adrian Wilson
author: Adrian Wilson

comments.content:
A nice piece on my talk has just appeared on the front page of [http://www.woodtyper.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014134350/http:/www.woodtyper.com/ "http://www.woodtyper.com/")

Hope to see you there!

Adrian
